definition: understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to describe sth as/an analogy/a simile/a metaphor/an allegory
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit

sentences.english: Sketch actor Zhao Benshan is a household name in China.
sentences.chinese: 赵本山在中国家喻户晓。

sentences.english: Dansko has long been known as a leader in professional shoes.
sentences.chinese: 邓肯作为一个专业级鞋类的领导者已经是家喻户晓。

sentences.english: They are one of the only household names online.
sentences.chinese: 他们的名称在网上是家喻户晓的。

sentences.english: Foothill Feicheng mentions Mu Kezhai west Taishan, everybody knows, widely known.
sentences.chinese: 在泰山西麓肥城提起穆柯寨，人人皆知，家喻户晓。

sentences.english: This is the story of hardships known Gou same.
sentences.chinese: 这与家喻户晓的勾践卧薪尝胆的典故如出一辙。
第二次世界大战使“雷达”一词家喻户晓。

sentences.english: The ones playing to packed houses do it well every time.
sentences.chinese: 那些家喻户晓的歌手每一次都能演奏的很好。

sentences.english: The world's romance with his Sandinista National Liberation Front (FSLN) has soured.
sentences.chinese: 桑迪若民族解放阵线家喻户晓的传奇故事已经变质。

sentences.english: NOKIA has already become a well-known brand name in China's energy market.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚已在中国家电市场成为家喻户晓的品牌。

sentences.english: The name of Mei Lanfang is popular among Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 梅兰芳这个名字在中国家喻户晓。

sentences.english: Zhou Cun plays the part of the Yuanxiao lantern show that plays activity and week village tradition already widely known.
sentences.chinese: 周村扮玩活动及周村传统的元宵灯会已家喻户晓。

sentences.english: If you break them, I am going to turn you into a ghoul .
sentences.chinese: 如果您打破他们，我将会把你成为一个家喻户晓。

sentences.english: The idea pleased Zhang Yining, a table tennis player who is a household name in China.
sentences.chinese: 中国家喻户晓的桌球名将张怡宁很欣赏这个构想。
这就是为什么他的名字现在家喻户晓。

sentences.english: Rather, big sponsors tend to be firms with brands that are already well-known.
sentences.chinese: 相反，大赞助商常是那些品牌家喻户晓的公司。

sentences.english: Torch Festival of the Yi people has a long history and wide influence.
sentences.chinese: 彝族火把节影响广泛，历久不衰，家喻户晓。
